First, there is a huge number of currencies in the world, and one hour of work of an Avatara person measured in various currencies is not quite convenient. It is better to set price in AvataraCoin tokens across the globe. In this case, one can easily count the cost of services in any country.  Second, a secure deal involving the Customer, Translator and Avatara should be closed via smart contracts.  Third, feedback on the Avatara persons should be stored in Blockchain for a long time. We are going to identify the Avatara persons which will make creating the second account impossible.
